name: Atomic 79
description: Atomic 79 is an intense, yet lighthearted, physics based first person shooter set in a cursed impact crater.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64-bit Processor: Intel i5 or Higher Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 110 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Win7 or Higher (64-bit) Processor: Intel i5 or Higher Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 110 MB available space
